description: Gets the access policy with the specified name in the specified environment.

resource_group_name.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

environment_name.description: The name of the Time Series Insights environment associated with the specified resource group.

access_policy_name.description: The name of the Time Series Insights access policy associated with the specified environment.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

error.description: Describes a particular API error with an error code and a message.
